Reviews.Content: dont negative reviews doing stay check greeted manager front desk girl extremely friendly helpful suggestions eat printed directions little tired looking comfortable dont prostitutes staying hotel staying bunch kids families breakfast yummy lots pastries muffins flavors id seen hot oatmeal 3 cereals overall pleasant stay definitely stay san diego
